page.title: 10BUCKNALL SCHOOL - ACTIVITIES
page.content: The desks are very modern being made out of metal, plastic and are Formica topped apart from a couple of desks that are hopefully soon going to be replaced. The school goes on many educational visits to Museums and the like. In the past few years we have been to Hull Docks Museum, Crich Tramway Museum, Kelham Island Museum in Sheffield, Speedwell Cavern and most recently we went to Lincoln City F.C. and the Museum of Lincolnshire Life although we are going to York this year - to the National Railway Museum and the Castle Museum. We haven't been yet. We also have plays. These have included Robin Hood, Brer Rabbit, a Circus, Wizards and Witches and this year's - the longest we have ever done - Charlie and the Chocolate Factory. I have the leading role, factory owner Willy Wonka.
